fakeRecipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fakeRecipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy egg sauce.

fakeRecipes.title: Chicken Caesar Saladd
fakeRecipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with traditional Caesar dressing, grilled chicken, and croutons.

fakeRecipes.title: Beef Bourguignon
fakeRecipes.description: A French stew made with beef braised in red wine and beef broth, flavored with carrots, onions, garlic, and a bouquet garni, and garnished with mushrooms and pearl onions.

fakeRecipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
fakeRecipes.description: A quick and healthy mix of assorted vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and sesame oil.

fakeRecipes.title: Quiche Lorraine
fakeRecipes.description: A savory pie from the Lorraine region of France with a pastry crust filled with eggs, cream, and smoked bacon.

fakeRecipes.title: Lamb Rogan Josh
fakeRecipes.description: Aromatic Kashmiri dish known for its vibrant red color with tender lamb cooked in a spiced gravy.

fakeRecipes.title: Pad Thai
fakeRecipes.description: A famous Thai noodle dish with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, shrimp, and flavored with tamarind pulp, fish sauce, garlic, red chili pepper, and palm sugar, garnished with roasted peanuts.

fakeRecipes.title: Fish Tacos
fakeRecipes.description: Lightly battered fish served on a soft tortilla with shredded cabbage, a zesty white sauce, and a squeeze of fresh lime.

fakeRecipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
fakeRecipes.description: A creamy Italian rice dish cooked with a variety of mushrooms and parmesan cheese.

fakeRecipes.title: Pumpkin Soup
fakeRecipes.description: A creamy, seasonal soup made with pureed pumpkin and a blend of warm spices.

fakeRecipes.title: Köfte
fakeRecipes.description: Köfte, kıymaların yuvarlanarak küçük bir top şeklini almasıyla yapılan bir yemektir. Bazen köfteye, ekmek kırıntıları, kıyılmış soğan, yumurta, tereyağı ve baharat gibi malzemeler de eklenir. Köfte, kızartma, pişirme veya buğulama yoluyla yapılabilir.

fakeRecipes.title: İçli Köfte
fakeRecipes.description: İçli köfte ya da oruk, bulgurun hamur hâline getirilerek içinin doldurulması suretiyle yapılan, Orta Doğu mutfağında bir yemektir. Aslen Levant mutfağına ait olan bu yemeğe kibbe ve bazı yörelerde dolgulu köfte de deniliyor.
